sourcesContent:
import { Paper,Box, Button, Dialog, DialogActions, DialogContent, DialogContentText, DialogTitle, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, TextField } from "@material-ui/core" import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import axios from 'axios'; interface FormData{ company_name: string, company_address: string, client_name: string, email: string, phone: number, } const Client = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const [rows , setRows] = useState(null); const { register, handleSubmit, reset, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); useEffect(() => { axios.get('api/client') .then((response) => {console.log(response.data); setRows(response.data)}) .catch((error) => {console.log(error);}); },[]); const handleClient = (data:FormData) => { // console.log(data); axios.post('api/client',data) .then((response) => {console.log(response);setRows((prevState) => [...prevState,response.data]); setOpen(!open);reset();}) .catch((error) => {console.log(error)}); } return ( setOpen(!open)} aria-labelledby="form-dialog-title"> Add New Client
Company Name Company Address Client Name Email Address) {rows && rows?.map((row) => ( {/* first */} {row.company_name} {row.company_address} {row.client_name} {row.email} {row.phone} ))}
) } export default Client
